description:
cmd/gc: Give better line numbers for errors in composite literals.

Credit to Russ for suggesting this fix.

Fixes issue 3925.

messages.text:
LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/6920051/diff/5001/src/cmd/gc/go.y
File src/cmd/gc/go.y (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6920051/diff/5001/src/cmd/gc/go.y#newcode983
src/cmd/gc/go.y:983: // introduce an anchor node to give the correct line.
s/anchor/wrapper/?
I don't know what anchor means here.

Just one documentation glitch.
